createWorld.customize.maze_world.title: Maze World Customization
maze_type.binary_tree.name: Binary Tree
maze_type.binary_tree.description: A very simple algorithm with a bias to make diagonal corridors
maze_type.wang_tiles.name: Wang Tiles
maze_type.wang_tiles.description: Makes a maze by filling in matching random tiles. This can generate corridors not connected to anything.
maze_type.round_wang_tiles.name: Round Wang Tiles
maze_type.round_wang_tiles.description: Makes a rounded off maze by filling in matching random tiles. This can generate corridors not connected to anything.
createWorld.customize.maze_world.infinit: Prevents the player from going above or below the walls in worlds without a ceiling by rejecting movement packets that cross the maze walls
